name: Dragonborn
description: Born of dragons, dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: Choose a dragon type: Black (Acid), Blue (Lightning), Brass (Fire), Bronze (Lightning), Copper (Acid), Gold (Fire), Green (Poison), Red (Fire), Silver (Cold), White (Cold). This determines your Breath Weapon damage type and Damage Resistance.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type determined by your Draconic Ancestry.

features.name: Breath Weapon
features.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one attack with an exhalation in a 15-foot Cone or 30-foot Line (5 ft wide). DEX save (DC = 8 + CON mod + Prof Bonus). Damage: 1d10 (1st), 2d10 (5th), 3d10 (11th), 4d10 (17th). Uses: Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest.

features.name: Draconic Flight
features.description: Starting at 5th level, as a Bonus Action you sprout spectral wings for 10 minutes, gaining Fly Speed equal to your Speed. Once per Long Rest.
